title: AFL star Lachlan Hunter proposes to longtime girlfriend Maddison
text:
They've been dating since they were teenage sweethearts.

And Western Bulldogs star Lachlan Hunter has finally popped the question to his long-term girlfriend Maddison Sullivan-Thorpe.

On Monday, the 24-year-old AFL player shared a photo to Instagram of the moment he proposed while the couple were on holiday in Italy.

Picture perfect! On Monday, AFL star Lachlan Hunter (right) proposed to his long-term girlfriend Maddison Sullivan-Thorpe (left) on the Amalfi Coast in Italy

In the photo, which was taken at the Le Sirenuse Hotel in Positano, Lachlan bends down on one knee in a navy shirt and blue jeans.

Maddison, who looks stylish in a pair of palazzo pants and a white knit top, places both hands on her fiancé's cheeks as she accepts his proposal.

The sweet moment took place against the stunning backdrop of the Tyrrhenian Sea.

Longtime lovers: Maddison and Lachlan, both 24, have been dating since they were teenagers

Proving himself to be a man of few words, captioned the photo with a ring emoji.

The couple attended their first Brownlow Medal ceremony together back in 2016.

At the time, Maddison told Mamamia she was nervous about attending the event and was 'sh*t scared about walking the red carpet'.

Going up! The couple attended their very first Brownlow Medal ceremony together in 2016

She then went on to discuss her beauty preparations for AFL's night of nights.

'I have had my Cara Delevingne-worthy brows poked and prodded, I've had my lip hair waxed from my face,' she said.

'I've eaten spray tan, been to countless fittings praying that the chocolate I ate the night before hasn't found its way onto my hips and apologised to my nail technician, who was given the unfortunate task of giving me a pedicure,' she added.
description: They've been dating since they were teenage sweethearts.
authors: Shannon Shipley For Daily Mail Australia
